REASON: Uncomfortable with the amount of vaginal discharge after use, had to use a pantyliner.
SIDE EFFECTS FOR CRINONE: I will continue to use crinone gel because I am trying to get pregnant and if I do it will be worth it, but it is kind of gross.

REASON: Excessive discharge requiring use of a pantiliner.

CRINONE: Unsightly, pellet-like discharge of gel build-up during coitus.
RATING: I was prescribed Crinone 8% gel to be used for uterine protection, in conjunction with Vivelle Dot 0.025 patch.  Due to the messiness of the gel, I requested to be switched to Prometrium 100mg capsules after using it for only 3 days.  I liked the idea of physically applying progesterone specifically where needed without a full systemic effect.  However, it just wasn't worth the mess and inconvenience!
